Package com.abdcelik

Class UserInterface<E extends MenuDrivenInterface>

java.lang.Object
com.abdcelik.UserInterface<E>
Type Parameters:
E - generic type for managing system. Generic type must implement MenuDrivenInterface
public class UserInterface<E extends MenuDrivenInterface>
extends java.lang.Object
User interface for the system.

      newPassword - administrator's new password
